goal: Create data structures for coherence validation results including severity levels, issue types, and result containers
description: This is the first task in implementing GitHub issue #86 (Architectural Coherence Validator). These types will be used by all coherence validation checks to report issues with consistent structure.

contains.name: IssueSeverity
contains.description: Enum for severity levels: ERROR, WARNING, INFO

contains.name: IssueType
contains.description: Enum for types of coherence issues: DUPLICATE, SIGNATURE_CONFLICT, BOUNDARY_VIOLATION, NAMING, DEPENDENCY, PATTERN, CONSTRAINT

contains.name: CoherenceIssue
contains.description: Dataclass representing a single coherence issue with issue_type, severity, message, suggestion, and location fields

contains.name: CoherenceResult
contains.description: Dataclass containing validation results and issue list with valid, issues fields

contains.name: errors
contains.description: Property returning count of ERROR severity issues

contains.name: warnings
contains.description: Property returning count of WARNING severity issues
